name: Reville Evidence - Spectator
description:
There's not much to it yet.  There's no interactive elements once you leave the first room, and the end of the Staircase is the last part (the Carpark has nothing).

I want REVILLE EVIDENCE - SPECTATOR to be an homage to Resident Evil Survivor, a Playstation original light-gun game.

This is an upload so you can see one of the things I've been working on in the last few months - I've got about 90 hours of development into it, and about 70 hours of that was just testing out visual style and asset production pipelines, the rest was debugging complex systems haha.

I'm thinking of revamping it and removing the 1990's "PSX" style completely to go for a more of a 2000's look, with a distinct style of a dystopian city with a smidge of cyberpunk aesthetic.

I already have a story I want to include.

See the readme.txt for all the credits/attributions.
